physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#136 Fannie Lorber at Sheltering Home.'' On back of photograph: ''#136 Silverberg? Young man shaking hands with gentleman and Fannie Lorber.''

mods.abstract: Fannie E. Lorber stands between two unidentified men in front of the National Home for Jewish Children. Mrs. Lorber was one of the founders of the Denver Sheltering Home, which opened in 1908.
mods.note: Donated by either Ida Hurwitz or Mr. and Mrs. Ben Glass.
